name: Space Cannon Baby
description:
SPACE CANNON BABY pits a defenseless baby in a stroller versus the chaotic environment of city life. As an orbital cannon operator, you notice the precarious situation and attempt to protect the baby.

For this JAM only one level has been developed. The controls are LEFT CLICK to FIRE, R to RESTART the stage and ESC to QUIT.

This game was made using Blender and Unity.

The development team consists of:

OWEN TESSMER - Lead Dev

ERIC BENZ - Lead Asset/Video
